dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Opel
dmca.body:
Google, Inc. 
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints 
1600 Amphiteatre Pkwy 
Mountain View 

By fax: 001-650-618-2680. 4 pages incl. this one 

Dr. Ulrlch Daniel, Intellectual Property - Patent and Trademarks 
Telefon +49 6142-7-77383, Fax +49 6142-7-78770 
E-Mail ulrich.dr.daniel@de.opel.com 


Notice on copyright infringement on http://auto-future.blogspot.com/2007/03/opel-agila.html 

											March 28, 2007  
Dear Sir or Madam, 

May I kindly inform you about a copyright infringement on a page that is owned by your company? The picture described as Opel Agila was taken by our company (screenshot attached), and publishing of this picture Is not permitted. Please remove this picture from the below mentioned page and all other pages as e.g. link pages to this page. 

The permalink of the post: 
http://auto-future.blogspot.com/Z007/03/opel-agila.html 
Post title: Opel Agila 
Date: Tuesday, March 27, 2007 

Please note that only the picture on the right side is protected and has to be removed. The link of the picture is: 
http://bp3.blogger.com/_YSNRkLCvook/RgkZUzutTzl/AAAAAAAAAJE/zmXPe4DAQsU/sl600-h/small+opel.jpg 

Other pictures appearing on this post are not part of the copyright of our company.

The copyright work is not listed at the U.S. Copyright Office. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of on exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

If you have any additional information, please don
